Name: Cordless Screwdriver
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: POUR vodka and champagne into glass and serve. Instruct drinker to down in one and then bite into the orange wedge.
Review: A slammer style drink for those looking for a fruity alternative to tequila.
Nutrition: One serving of Cordless Screwdriver contains 66 calories
